title: Guys , when are we supposed to fill our round 2 percentile ?

comments.body: can i participate in round 2 if i did not register for round 1
earlier it was possible life before 1 week it was possible, now they have removed the jee option
didn't do before i found out about PES like 2 days ago :( can i do now?
I registered but did not put my jee percentile in
I registered and paid money but when to put in my jee percentileÂ
haan then ig now you can put your jee percentile when they ask for it.
It is still not open to put our jee percentile. Do you know any tentative date to put our jee percentile or any tentative date when round 2 will happen?
